ability.Electric Surge: Summons Electric Terrain when the Pokemon enters the battle, which lasts for 5 turns.
ability.Thunderous Rage: When this Pokemon is below 1/3 HP, it will be enraged and all its attacks always hit.

Thunder.effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. If the weather is Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%.

Parabolic Charge.effect: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target.

Deflecting Aura.effect: Summons Deflecting Aura for 3 turns. At each end of the turn during Deflecting Aura, the user's defense and special defense is increased by 1 stage.

Draco Meteor.effect: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.

Raging Horn.effect: This move always lands a critical hit if the user is in enraged state.
